findings.title: numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity equals total supply
findings.description: The variable numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity has been set equal to the total supply.

findings.title: Liquidity fee is burn fee
findings.description: The liquidity fee is set as the burn fee, which might have unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deposit() function could withdraw token amount from any address
findings.description: The Deposit() function can be called by the server address and withdraw token amounts from any address.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception in includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply functions due to long excluded addresses list
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
